text:
Dulha Ranveer Singh Will Arrive With ‘Band Baaja Baaraat’ On A Seaplane At Wedding Number 2!
Dulha Ranveer Singh Will Arrive With ‘Band Baaja Baaraat’ On A Seaplane At Wedding Number 2!
DeepVeer fans have been waiting for just one heartwarming picture from Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh’s wedding, but their wait isn't over yet. The much-in-love couple tied the knot in a traditional Konkani ceremony yesterday, and a few pictures from the hush-hush wedding have been doing the rounds on social media.
Today, they will get married again in an Anand Karaj ceremony. While yesterday’s ceremony was reportedly all romantic, today’s ceremony will be all full of fun, frolic and laughter.
Ranveer Singh, the charming-sauve and all-time energetic man that he is, will arrive on a seaplane with his baraat instead of horse carriage. When it’s about Ranveer Singh, expect it be full of fun and excitement. We wouldn’t be surprised if he danced to Khalibali too.
Don't Miss 460 SHARES 1.7 K SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.5 K SHARES
“Ranveer has also chartered two luxury yachts for his guests to reach Villa del Balbianello where Deepika, her family, and guests will be waiting,” read a report on Peeping Moon.
A video is already doing the rounds! Check it out below!
Well, we just can’t wait to catch a glimpse of this. Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone, here's to happily ever after!
Also Read: From Ring Ceremony To Sangeet, Here’s How Deepika & Ranveer Celebrated Day 1 Of Wedding Festivities In Italy
title: Dulha Ranveer Singh Will Arrive With ‘Band Baaja Baaraat’ On A Seaplane At Wedding Number 2!
description: Not on horses, Ranveer Singh, the charming-sauve and all-time energetic man that he is, will instead arrive on a seaplane with his baraat. When it’s about Ranveer Singh, expect it be full of fun and excitement. We wouldn’t be surprised he danced to Khalibali too.
